description: Third aett (8 runes) of Elder Futhark - runes 17-24

runes.name: Tiwaz
runes.lesson: Fight for what matters; lead with honor and courage

runes.name: Berkano
runes.lesson: Tend new life; create conditions for flourishing

runes.name: Ehwaz
runes.lesson: Work in harmony; trust the relationship to carry you forward

runes.name: Mannaz
runes.lesson: Know yourself; serve the collective while honoring individuality

runes.name: Laguz
runes.lesson: Flow with feeling; trust your inner knowing

runes.name: Ingwaz
runes.lesson: Plant with intention; nurture what wants to grow

runes.name: Dagaz
runes.lesson: Step into new light; embrace the transformation
runes.warning: False dawn, spiritual bypassing, avoiding integration

runes.name: Othala
runes.lesson: Honor your roots; build something lasting for those who follow
runes.warning: Nationalism, clinging to past, excluding others
